At University Unipix, we believe in the: At University Unipix, we believe in the transformative power of education and the boundless potential within every individual. Established in 1971, we have been dedicated to fostering intellectual curiosity, academic excellence, and a vibrant campus community.

facility_1: 1- Large Playground, 1,500 m. wide, for conducting all types of sporting games and developing the skills of students.
facility_2: 2- Multi-media and scientific specialties room to discover/engage/interact with modern technologies and developments.
facility_3: 3- Music room to inspire development and explore our student's musical skills.
facility_4: 4- School library with a large collection of books, encylopedias and multimedia resources covering a wide array of topics from sciences to novels and various specialties to entertainment magazines to broaden our student's horizons.
facility_5: 5- Science labs equipped to the highest standards.
facility_6: 6- Physical education room equipped with the latest sport facilities.
facility_7: 7- Smart board technology for interactive learning in all academic subjects.
Psychological Prep Item 1: The school teaches him how to establish communicative relationships and encourages the student to participate in physical education with his peers.
Psychological Prep Item 2: The school cares about the relationship between the school and the home, which helps in adapting the child inside the school and home, not only in learning outcomes but also in emotional and psychological growth.
Psychological Prep Item 3: The School achieves mutual understanding between home and school, which helps in developing the student's personality in educational, physical, and psychological aspects.
Psychological Prep Item 4: The school receives children with teachers who resemble their mothers in many basic aspects, so the teacher becomes the child's substitute mother to a large extent.
Psychological Prep Item 5: Providing some sports and entertaining activities such as music and singing without completely overloading the child's brain with school subjects at this early stage of his life.
Role of Social Specialist: The Role of the Social Specialist in School
Role Point 1: Individual services are the basis of the social worker's work at the school, where through scientific experience, they can achieve psychological and social adjustment.
Role Point 2: Caring for urgent situations and cases, and supervising gifted, talented, and academically delayed students through integrated plans throughout the academic year.
Role Point 3: Investing in students' abilities and potential to help them face various situations they are exposed to.
Role Point 4: Encouraging students to implement small projects to develop their skills in feasibility studies, accounting, negotiation, and marketing.
Role Point 5: Forming activity groups that complement the curriculum and rely on practice and self-reliance.
Role Point 6: The Trips Group helps in developing loyalty to the nation and the community and is connected to the curriculum for each stage.
Role Point 7: Organizing the Public Service Group that focuses on projects supporting positive values, such as environmental care and school beautification.
Role Point 8: Activating the role of the Board of Trustees, parents, and teachers to enhance the educational process and educational activities.
Role Point 9: Working on community participation through volunteering in development efforts, whether by opinion, work, or financing, to support the educational process.
Role Point 10: Forming the Red Crescent team, holding scientific lectures, and conducting visits to nearby hospitals to foster a spirit of cooperation.
Goal 1: Preparing a good citizen for himself and society.
Goal 2: Providing students with scientific and behavioral knowledge and experiences.
Goal 3: Instilling religious and national values and principles.
Goal 4: Preparing students to adapt to social life.
Goal 5: Instilling leadership spirit and a decisive personality.
Goal 6: Preparing students for creativity and innovation.
Goal 7: Developing methodical, critical, and rational thinking.
Goal 8: Training students on correct scientific research methods.
Goal 9: Instilling the spirit of cooperation among students.
School Vision Desc: Creating an effective community that values learning, thinking, and technology, with ethical discipline and conscious upbringing.
Mission 1: Building generations committed to religious and behavioral awareness.
Mission 2: Developing open and talented minds through seminars and competitions.
Mission 3: Building a beneficial and positive personality through community activities.
Mission 4: Encouraging students to use modern technology for self-learning.
Mission 5: Monitoring the educational process with continuous evaluation for quality.
Mission 6: Encouraging self-talents and creative abilities through rewards.
Educational Stages Desc: The school includes various educational stages from Kindergarten to High School. This ensures pedagogical consistency and psychological stability for students and their families throughout their educational journey. This has led to the school appearing at an eye-catching level in terms of results for all educational stages.
Quality Desc: The school is the first private school in the Dokki Educational Administration to receive accreditation from the National Authority for Quality Assurance and Accreditation of Education. This was achieved through strategic planning and highly trained educational staff.
Accreditation 2: Second consecutive Accreditation received in May 2018, confirming its leadership in quality.
Alumni Desc: Many prominent public figures and professionals in medicine, engineering, pharmacy, and the police force have graduated from our school, carrying the flag of progress for our beloved nation.
Activities Desc: The school is distinguished by participating in all local activities and competitions and obtaining advanced positions, which also led to the brilliance of our students in community service and environmental activities.
Covering all stages from Kindergarten to: Covering all stages from Kindergarten to High School
Achievement 1: Abdullah Ali Abdullah secured 1st place in the Recitation competition (Educational Administration) - 1st Prep, 2019/2020.
Achievement 2: Omar Hamdy Sayed secured 2nd place in the Recitation competition (Educational Administration) - 6th Primary, 2019/2020.
Achievement 3: Mohamed Karem Mahny received the 'Young Inventor' award from the Educational Administration - 6th Grade, 2017/2018.
Achievement 4: Kenzy Atef secured 3rd place in the Tennis competition at the Administration and Governorate levels - 1st Secondary.
Achievement 5: Omar Abdel Rahman secured 5th level in the Swimming competition at the Girls' Center - 5th Primary.
Achievement 6: Abdel Rahman Tamer and Ahmed Rady secured 3rd place in the Basketball competition at the Administration level.
Achievement 7: Sarah Abdel Rahman secured 4th place in the Swimming competition at the Administration and Governorate levels.
School Award 1: The school won 1st place in the Educational Administration for its Sports Display on March 17, 2022.
School Award 2: Organizing various student competitions including Mother's Day celebrations and community activities.
